name: Primeape
description: If approached while asleep, it may awaken and angrily give chase in a groggy state of semi-sleep.

attacks.name: Bebop Punch
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
